result.markdown: --- title: "Hugo Åkerstrand, PhD" subtitle: | R Programming | Life Science Research | Data Visualization # image: _files/website/img/profile.jpg # image-alt: Headshot of Hugo Åkerstrand. Photo by Svetlana Åkerstrand. about: template: solana image-width: 20em image-shape: round id: hero-heading # links: # - text: "{{< fa brands linkedin >}}" # aria-label: "LinkedIn" # href: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/hugo-%C3%A5kerstrand-74696655" # - text: "{{< fa brands github >}}" # aria-label: "GitHub" # href: "https://github.com/hugoakerstrand/" # - text: "{{< fa solid envelope >}}" # aria-label: "Email" # href: "mailto:hugo.akerstrand@gmail.com" # - text: "{{< ai orcid >}}" # href: "https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2457-0764" # aria-label: "ORCID" # - text: "{{< ai pubmed >}}" # href: "https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/?term=%C3%85kerstrand+H&cauthor_id=35088351" # aria-label: "Pubmed" twitter-card: title: Hugo Åkerstrand, PhD description: | Life science research, R programming, & data visualization. image: assets/website/img/profile.jpg page-layout: full execute: freeze: auto echo: false warning: false --- ::: {#hero-heading} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} age_of_AI <- TRUE Hugo <- function( thinking = TRUE, learning = TRUE, developing = TRUE) { if(all(c(thinking, learning, developing))) { for(human in length(age_of_AI)) { return("A human in the loop") } } } Hugo() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "A human in the loop" ``` ::: ::: :::
